item.title: Chromebook for Developers
item.description: ChromeOS is a modern approach to laptop: everything runs in a browser but it can host Linux apps. Now, there are serous high-end Chromebooks like Pixelbook from Google, Samsung, and Asus. Chromebooks are very secure, fast, beautiful, and functional. Now you can run Web apps (Dah!), Chrome apps and extensions, android apps (through google play), and (this is exciting) Linux apps (through hosted container). Buy a Chromebook or Pixelbook You do not need to do dirty hacks like turn on developer mode, install crouton or termux, or dual boot it with linux.
